cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuwawaru

sentence.romaji: watashitachi no chi-mu ni kare ga kuwawata
sentence.english: He joined our team.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iikagen

sentence.kanji: いい加減なことを言ってはいけません。
sentence.romaji: iikagen na koto wo ite ha ikemasen
sentence.english: You shouldn't say thoughtless things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uketori

sentence.kanji: 受け取りに判子をお願いします。
sentence.romaji: uketori ni hanko wo onegai shimasu
sentence.english: Please stamp your seal on the receipt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's torikaeru

sentence.kanji: シーツを取り替えました。
sentence.romaji: shi-tsu wo torikaemashita
sentence.english: I changed the sheets.

cards.english: pay for another, pay in advance
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatekaeru

sentence.kanji: お金がないなら私が立て替えておきます。
sentence.romaji: okane ga nai nara watashi ga tatekaete okimasu
sentence.english: I'll pay for you for the time being if you have no money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kabuseru

sentence.kanji: 本にカバーを被せたの。
sentence.romaji: hon ni kaba- wo kabuseta no 。
sentence.english: I put a cover on the book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakai

sentence.kanji: 自然の破壊が進んでいるのよ。
sentence.romaji: shizen no hakai ga susunde iru no yo
sentence.english: The destruction of nature is advancing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seitou

sentence.kanji: 選挙では3つの政党が争っています。
sentence.romaji: senkyo de ha mitsu no seitou ga arasote imasu
sentence.english: Three political parties are competing in the election.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nokorazu

sentence.kanji: ゴミを残らず拾ったよ。
sentence.romaji: gomi wo nokorazu hirota yo
sentence.english: I picked up all the garbage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hayari

sentence.kanji: この服は今の流行です。
sentence.romaji: kono fuku ha ima no hayari desu
sentence.english: These clothes are the latest fashion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryuukou

sentence.kanji: このスタイルは今年の流行です。
sentence.romaji: kono sutairu ha kotoshi no ryuukou desu
sentence.english: This style is in fashion this year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saiteki

sentence.kanji: ここは子育てに最適な環境です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha kosodate ni saiteki na kankyou desu
sentence.english: This is the best environment for bringing up children.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ushinau

sentence.kanji: 彼は地震で親を失いました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jishin de oya wo ushinaimashita
sentence.english: He lost his parents due to the earthquake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's danjo

sentence.kanji: そのスポーツは男女一緒にします。
sentence.romaji: sono supo-tsu ha danjo isho ni shimasu
sentence.english: Men and women play that sport together.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kisei

sentence.kanji: 牛肉の輸入が厳しく規制されているわね。
sentence.romaji: gyuuniku no yunyuu ga kibishiku kisei sarete iru wa ne
sentence.english: Beef imports are severely regulated.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaifuku

sentence.kanji: 体がすっかり回復した。
sentence.romaji: karada ga sukari kaifuku shita
sentence.english: I've completely recovered.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shokuba

sentence.kanji: 自宅から職場まで1時間かかります。
sentence.romaji: jitaku kara shokuba made ichijikan kakarimasu
sentence.english: It takes one hour from home to the office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakuryoku

sentence.kanji: 学力を付けてその大学に進みたい。
sentence.romaji: gakuryoku wo tsukete sono daigaku ni susumitai
sentence.english: I want to improve my academic skills then go to that college.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ookurashou

sentence.kanji: 彼は大蔵省に勤務しているんだよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ookurashou ni kinmu shite iru n da yo
sentence.english: He works for the Ministry of Finance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kitei

sentence.kanji: 代金には規定の手数料が含まれます。
sentence.romaji: daikin ni ha kitei no tesuuryou ga fukumaremasu
sentence.english: Our price includes a set handling fee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyouretsu

sentence.kanji: 店の前に長い行列ができていますよ。
sentence.romaji: mise no mae ni nagai gyouretsu ga dekite imasu yo
sentence.english: There is a long line in front of the shop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's resha

sentence.kanji: 列車がホームに入ってきた。
sentence.romaji: resha ga ho-mu ni haite kita
sentence.english: The train has arrived at the platform.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's retsu

sentence.kanji: 店の前に長い列ができていたね。
sentence.romaji: mise no mae ni nagai retsu ga dekite ita ne
sentence.english: A long line formed in front of the shop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurou

sentence.kanji: 母は苦労して私たちを育てたの。
sentence.romaji: haha ha kurou shite watashitachi wo sodateta no
sentence.english: My mother had a hard time bringing us up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rouryoku

sentence.kanji: 仕事には時間と労力が必要です。
sentence.romaji: shigoto ni ha jikan to rouryoku ga hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: Working requires time and labor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kankyou

sentence.kanji: 引っ越して環境が変わりました。
sentence.romaji: hikoshite kankyou ga kawarimashita
sentence.english: My environment changed since I moved to a new location.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitsubou

sentence.kanji: 彼女は結婚生活に失望していたの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kekon seikatsu ni shitsubou shite ita no
sentence.english: She found married life disappointing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machinozomu

sentence.kanji: その国の人々は平和を待ち望んでいるの。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni no hitobito ha heiwa wo machinozonde iru no
sentence.english: The citizens of that country are hoping for peace.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutomeru

sentence.kanji: 良い成績が取れるように努めます。
sentence.romaji: ii seiseki ga toreru you ni tsutomemasu
sentence.english: I make efforts to get good grades.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kufuu

sentence.kanji: いろいろ工夫して仕事をやりとげたさ。
sentence.romaji: iroiro kufuu shite shigoto wo yaritogeta sa
sentence.english: I made various adjustments and carried out the work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haji

sentence.kanji: 間違えることは恥ではありません。
sentence.romaji: machigaeru koto ha haji de ha arimasen
sentence.english: There's no shame in making a mistake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenryoku

sentence.kanji: 彼はこの国で大きな権力を持っているわ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kono kuni de ooki na kenryoku wo mote iru wa
sentence.english: He has a lot of power in this country.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shou

sentence.kanji: このデザインは数々の賞を受けています。
sentence.romaji: kono dezain ha kazukazu no shou wo ukete imasu
sentence.english: This design has received a lot of prizes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouhin

sentence.kanji: パーティーのビンゴの賞品は何がいいだろう。
sentence.romaji: pa-tei- no bingo no shouhin ha nani ga iidarou
sentence.english: What might be a good prize for bingo at the party?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ノ-ベルshou

sentence.kanji: 日本人がノーベル賞を取ったよ。
sentence.romaji: nihonjin ga no-berushou wo tota yo
sentence.english: A Japanese person won the Nobel prize.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's setoku

sentence.kanji: なんとか親を説得してみるよ。
sentence.romaji: nantoka oya wo setoku shite miru yo
sentence.english: I will try my best to persuade my parents.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eru

sentence.kanji: 彼は大金を得ましたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha taikin wo emashita yo
sentence.english: He obtained a lot of money.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokusuru

sentence.kanji: ネットで得する情報を見つけたよ。
sentence.romaji: neto de toku suru jouhou wo mitsuketa yo
sentence.english: I found good deals on the internet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toku

sentence.kanji: この車を今買うとお得ですよ。
sentence.romaji: kono kuruma wo ima kau to o toku desu yo
sentence.english: There's a special offer on this car if you buy it now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seijou

sentence.kanji: 患者の呼吸は正常です。
sentence.romaji: kanja no kokyuu ha seijou desu
sentence.english: The patient's breathing is normal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toriatsukau

sentence.kanji: 当店ではお酒を取り扱っておりません。
sentence.romaji: touten de ha o sake wo toriatsukate orimasen
sentence.english: We don't sell alcohol in this shop.

sentence.romaji: kono kikai ha toriatsukai ni chuui shite kudasai
sentence.english: Be careful when handling this machine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yaku

sentence.kanji: 彼女は弁護士の役を演じているんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha bengoshi no yaku wo enjite iru n da
sentence.english: She's playing the part of a lawyer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuyaku

sentence.kanji: 彼は学校の劇で主役に選ばれたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha gakou no geki de shuyaku ni erabareta yo
sentence.english: He was chosen for a leading part in the school play.

sentence.romaji: roku ha kotoni wakamono ni ninki da
sentence.english: Rock music is especially popular among young people.

sentence.kanji: 彼は特殊な能力を持っています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tokushu na nouryoku wo mote imasu
sentence.english: He has a special ability.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kasuka

sentence.kanji: 階下から微かな音が聞こえた。
sentence.romaji: kaika kara kasuka na oto ga kikoeta
sentence.english: I heard a faint sound from downstairs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bimyou

sentence.kanji: 彼は会社で微妙な立場にあります。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaisha de bimyou na tachiba ni arimasu
sentence.english: He's in a delicate position in the company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's torikeshi

sentence.romaji: kare ha menkyo torikeshi no shobun wo uketa yo
sentence.english: He had his driver's license revoked.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitagau

sentence.kanji: 上司の指示に従った。
sentence.romaji: joushi no shiji ni shitagata
sentence.english: I followed my boss' instructions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hishi

sentence.romaji: gakuseitachi ha jugyou ni tsuite iku no ni hishi desu
sentence.english: Students are desperately trying to follow the class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sechi

sentence.romaji: o mise ni bouhan kamera ga sechi sareta wa ne
sentence.english: A security camera was installed in the shop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yaburu

sentence.kanji: 彼は強敵を見事に破ったね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kyouteki wo migoto ni yabuta ne
sentence.english: He heroically defeated the powerful enemy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's odokasu

sentence.romaji: kare ha tsuneni shisei ga ii
sentence.english: His posture is always good.

sentence.romaji: shi wo osoreru no ha shizen na koto desu
sentence.english: It is natural to be afraid of death.

sentence.romaji: ano kyodai na tatemono ha hakubutsukan desu
sentence.english: That huge building is a museum.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kigae

sentence.kanji: 着替えを旅行カバンに詰めたよ。
sentence.romaji: kigae wo ryokou kaban ni tsumeta yo
sentence.english: I packed spare clothes in a travel bag.

sentence.kanji: この鉢植えは観賞用です。
sentence.romaji: kono hachiue ha kanshouyou desu
sentence.english: This potted plant is for ornamental purposes.

sentence.kanji: この鍋は鉄でできています。
sentence.romaji: kono nabe ha tetsu de dekite imasu
sentence.english: This pot is made of iron.

sentence.kanji: 彼は長い間海に潜っていたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nagai aida umi ni mogute ita no
sentence.english: He was diving in the sea for a long time.

sentence.kanji: その池の水は濁っているね。
sentence.romaji: sono ike no mizu ha nigote iru ne
sentence.english: The pond water is cloudy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doutoku

sentence.romaji: kodomo ni ha doutoku wo kichinto oshiete ikitaito omoimasu
sentence.english: I'd like to properly teach my kids about morality.

sentence.kanji: 夕方の市街は車が渋滞するよ。
sentence.romaji: yuugata no shigai ha kuruma ga juutai suru yo
sentence.english: The town gets congested with cars in the late afternoon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chokei

sentence.romaji: kono en ha chokei 6 senchi desu
sentence.english: This circle has a diameter of 6cm.

sentence.kanji: このナスは畑で取れたばかりです。
sentence.romaji: kono nasu ha hatake de toreta bakari desu
sentence.english: This eggplant has just been picked from the field.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawa

sentence.kanji: りんごの皮をむきましたよ。
sentence.romaji: ringo no kawa wo mukimashita yo
sentence.english: I peeled an apple.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soushiki

sentence.kanji: 彼の葬式は明日です。
sentence.romaji: kare no soushiki ha ashita desu
sentence.english: His funeral is tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toridasu

sentence.kanji: 彼はポケットから財布を取り出したの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha poketo kara saifu wo toridashita no
sentence.english: He took his wallet out of his pocket.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishun

sentence.kanji: 一瞬自分の耳を疑ったよ。
sentence.romaji: ishun jibun no mimi wo utagata yo
sentence.english: For a moment I couldn't believe what I heard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atsuryoku

sentence.kanji: 相手会社から強い圧力が掛かった。
sentence.romaji: aitegaisha kara tsuyoi atsuryoku ga kakata
sentence.english: The other company put on a lot of pressure.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otokorashii

sentence.kanji: 彼は男らしさを心掛けているね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha otokorashisa wo kokorogakete iru ne
sentence.english: He's making an effort to appear manly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakitori

sentence.kanji: 僕たちは毎朝漢字の書き取りをします。
sentence.romaji: bokutachi ha maiasa kanji no kakitori wo shimasu
sentence.english: We do kanji dictation every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daijin

sentence.kanji: 大臣が汚職で逮捕されました。
sentence.romaji: daijin ga oshoku de taiho saremashita
sentence.english: The minister was arrested for corruption.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nozomu

sentence.kanji: 選手は最高の状態で大会に臨んだわ。
sentence.romaji: senshu ha saikou no joutai de taikai ni nozonda wa
sentence.english: Athletes took part in the meet in top condition.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rinji

sentence.kanji: 彼女は臨時の店員です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha rinji no tenin desu
sentence.english: She's a temporary clerk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunretsu

sentence.kanji: 会社が二つの派閥に分裂しているんだ。
sentence.romaji: kaisha ga futatsu no habatsu ni bunretsu shite iru n da
sentence.english: The company has been divided into two factions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's natsukashii

sentence.kanji: ここは私にとって懐かしい場所です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha watashi ni tote natsukashii basho desu
sentence.english: This is a nostalgic place for me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukatsu

sentence.kanji: その選手は怪我を乗り越えて復活したわね。
sentence.romaji: sono senshu ha kega wo norikoete fukatsu shita wa ne
sentence.english: The player recovered from the injury.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiman

sentence.kanji: 彼女はよく自分の成績を自慢するよね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha yoku jibun no seiseki wo jiman suru yo ne
sentence.english: She often boasts about her results.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's susumeru

sentence.kanji: 勧められて欲しくもないものを買っちゃったよ。
sentence.romaji: susumerarete hoshiku mo nai mono wo kachata yo
sentence.english: On someone's advice, I ended up buying something I didn't want.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakutoku

sentence.romaji: sono senshu no kakutoku shoukin ha niokuen date
sentence.english: I hear the acquisition bonus for that player is 200 million yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nami

sentence.kanji: 今日の海は波が穏やかです。
sentence.romaji: kyou no umi ha nami ga odayaka desu
sentence.english: Waves are calm on the sea today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kashikoi

sentence.kanji: 彼は冷静で賢い男だね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha reisei de kashikoi otoko da ne
sentence.english: He is a calm, wise man.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bakin

sentence.romaji: bakin wo 3 manen mo torareta yo
sentence.english: I was fined no less than 30,000 yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's basuru

sentence.romaji: kare ha ihou chuusha de baserareta n da
sentence.english: He was fined for illegal parking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's batsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は悪いことをしたので罰を受けたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha warui koto wo shita node batsu wo uketa n da
sentence.english: He did something bad so he was punished.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toriaezu

sentence.kanji: 取り敢えずお知らせしておきます。
sentence.romaji: toriaezu oshirase shite okimasu
sentence.english: Here's my report, for now.

cards.english: be inferior to, be worse than
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otoru

sentence.kanji: 私は体力では誰にも劣りません。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha tairyoku de ha dare ni mo otorimasen
sentence.english: My physical strength is second to none.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hagemasu

sentence.romaji: chichi ga musuko wo hagemashita no
sentence.english: The father encouraged his son.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinzou

sentence.kanji: 祖母は心臓が悪いんだ。
sentence.romaji: sobo ha shinzou ga warui n da
sentence.english: My grandmother has a heart condition.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's baasan

sentence.kanji: 彼女は元気なお婆さんね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha genki na obaasan ne
sentence.english: She's a sprightly old lady.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shashou

sentence.romaji: shashou san ga shanai wo mawate kita yo
sentence.english: The conductor went around the carriage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakeru

sentence.romaji: kugi ni hikakete sode ga sakete shimata na
sentence.english: I caught it on the nail and tore the sleeve.
